00026 serverrec::serverrec()
00027 {
00028         strlcpy(name,"",256);
00029         pingtime = 0;
00030         lastping = TIME;
00031         usercount_i = usercount = opercount = version = 0;
00032         hops_away = 1;
00033         signon = TIME;
00034         jupiter = false;

00048         lastping = TIME;
00049         usercount_i = usercount = opercount = 0;
